All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
CharacterComponent
CharacterComponet organises the different component's required to display the character
CommandsComponent
Component class to show the availble actions for the player
Component
Helps render component's together for the display
Console
Small helper class that wraps common and repeated behaviour for interacting with the console
ConsoleComponent
Displays the console to the user
Dimension
The Dimension class contains info about the size and constraint's of a component
Dungeon
The Dungeon class contains everything related to the dungeon and helps the player travers and battle
InventoryComponent
Shows the inventory to the user
Main
Controlls the entire program
MapComponent
Dispalys the minimap and the legend togther so the player always knows where they are in the game
Room
Cointains vital information about the layout of a room
RoomComponent
Displays the room to the user
Window
The main display responsible to grouping all the components and showing it to the user
